text: eṉiṉum, avarkaḷ (ataip) puṟakkaṇittu(p pāvattil āḻntu) viṭṭaṉar. (Ākavē, avarkaḷ kaṭṭiyirunta makattāṉatoru aṇaiyai uṭaikkakkūṭiya) perum veḷḷattai avarkaḷukkuk kēṭāka aṉuppivaittōm. Avarkaḷuṭaiya (uṉṉatamāṉa kaṉikaḷaiyuṭaiya) iru cōlaikaḷaik kacappum, puḷippumuḷḷa kāykaḷaiyuṭaiya maraṅkaḷālum, cila ilantai maraṅkaḷālum nirampiya tōppukaḷāka māṟṟiviṭṭōm
